widgets_values: "A beautiful, serene landscape unfolds before us, with rolling hills and lush greenery stretching as far as the eye can see. A delicate, antique glass bottle lies abandoned on a rocky outcropping, its transparent walls glowing with an ethereal light that seems almost otherworldly. The bottle appears to be filled with a deep, rich purple liquid that perfectly captures the color of a distant galaxy, with swirling clouds of gas and dust visible within. The surrounding landscape is bathed in a soft, golden light, with the warm rays of the sun casting a gentle glow across the scene. A few wispy clouds drift lazily across the sky, adding a sense of depth and atmosphere to the already breathtaking view. The overall mood is one of peaceful contemplation, as if the viewer has stumbled upon a secret, hidden world that exists just beyond the edge of reality."
